title: what’s with people saying ez no matter what even if they don’t win by a landslide after a game?
body: just wondering, for some reason people saying ez after games makes me tilted

replies.body: I think they're just excited about the new ezreal changes. {{champion:81}}
You just answered your own question :)
so do they say it to tilt me
Yes. Don't let the trolls win. Ignore it.
No one taught them good sportsmanship growing up that's why.

> [{quoted}](name=TheeKingKrispy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ENnwHmZ0,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-10-05T04:14:52.777+0000)
>
> so do they say it to tilt me

To tilt you, your team, their own team

i do it all the time, but only after a landslide win (like 20 mins, 40 kills, uncontested objectives scenario)
i also do it, when i out play 1v3/4/5 or you just send an obligatory question mark

Basically to tilt you and your team. Happens to me all the time, but doesn't really tilt me unless it was a game where we completely decimated them but ended up losing coz of an afk. Oh god nothing tilts me more. "We got absolutely raped all game, but you had an afk so EZ GG" 

The only time I do it is when it's a 4v5 or 3v5 and we still manage to win. If you lose to me while having a massive advantage like 5v4 or 5v3, then I'm sorry, but you deserve to be trash talked like that lol.
